column6: FROM THE CREATOR OF THE HIT COMIC "COPRA" It's a battle royale when the new superteens on the block go up against the most dangerous supergangs on the street! Will the bloodthirsty vigilante, SCOURGE, take everyone in a costume down, be it street punk or good guy? Will SPIDER-MAN, BLACK WIDOW, KITTY PRYDE, BOMBSHELL, CLOAK & DAGGER survive a second wave of violence when the deadly CROSSBONES joins the fray?
column8: | writer:Michel Fiffe | penciller (cover):David Nakayama | artist:Amilcar Pinna
